    • メソッドの詳細

      • saveFusionViewerLog

        public void saveFusionViewerLog(java.lang.String dir,
                                double startTime,
                                double time,
                                int count,
                                java.util.List<AgentBase> agents)
        Saves the agent positions to the PTF. The log format is based on Fusion Viewer log type as follows: DATE-TIME,frame,no,ID,x,y,lx,ly,lz,NS,wx,EW,wy,wz,subject,feature,gender, attribute,group,action,state,free The above format is a line separated with ",". Please check README file, if you want to know the details.
        パラメータ:
        dir - logging directory that Fusion Viewer log files are saved.
        time - simulation time.
        count - simulation step.

      • waitConnection

        public void waitConnection()
        Send the PTF packets to a specified address and port. The functionalities are quite same with saveFusionViewerLog.

      • getOutputStream

        public java.io.BufferedOutputStream getOutputStream()

      • setOutputStream

                                double time,
                                int count,
                                java.util.List<AgentBase> agents)
